column3: I like this, but an munlock() call should be issued when deallocating, after clearing the memory.\n
Good idea;  add a munlock and rebase and looks to me like it's ready to pull.\n
Been doing similar stuff for new wallet crypter, with more stuff mlocked, but looks good to me (once munlock()d)\nedit: oh, I need to read, anyway, looks good to me.\n
Because I depend on this for the new encryption branch, I went ahead and did the munlock stuff, current version is at ee286b3ced9c80c12c369ccceb21ec287f24306b\n
